title: Émilie
overview: Émilie is a little girl full of life and like all little girls of her age, Emilie is in a good or bad mood, loves to dress up, play in the garden, meet her friends, enjoy the seasons… there are so many things to discover in a day! In a fresh and uncluttered universe, the little ones will follow with pleasure the adventures of Emilie and her friends and will learn with them the simple things of the everyday life.
